import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { format } from 'date-fns'; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import Breadcrumb from '../components/widget/Breadcrumb'; import posts from './../data/posts'; function BlogSingle() { const { id } = useParams(); const post = posts.find((pt) => pt.id === parseInt(id,10)) function createMarkup(val) { return {__html: val}; } return (

{post.title}

  • {post.created_by.name}
  • {format(new Date(post.created_at), 'dd MMMM yyyy')}
  • {post.comments_count} Comments
  • {post.category.title}
  • {post.tag}

{post.created_by.name}

{post.created_by.bio}

{/* end author */}
{post.comments_count >= 1 ? ( <>

{post.comments_count} Comments

) : <>}

Leave a Reply

Your email address will not be published. Required fields are marked *

{/* end col-lg-8 */}
) } export default BlogSingle;
